requirement.topic: Given command line arguments overwrite variables set in xmlBlaster.properties
requirement.description: The xmlBlaster.properties file allows to customize the behavior of xmlBlaster. If you add a xmlBlaster.properties variable (with an added "-" prefix) at the command line on startup, this overwrites the setting from xmlBlaster.properties or adds this setting if not yet present.
requirement.example:
The "Persistence.Path" is set in xmlBlaster.properties and may be overwritten on command line:
"java org.xmlBlaster.Main -Persistence.Path /tmp"
You need to activate this feature in your code like follows:
"XmlBlasterProperty.init(args);"
requirement.author: xmlBlaster@marcelruff.info
